bibl.seg: GODDIO Franck, André BERNAND, Étienne BERNAND, Ibrahim DARWISH, Zsolt KISS and Jean YOYOTTE, Alexandria: The Submerged Royal Quarters. Surveys and Excavations 1992-97.
London, Periplus, 1998, 4°, xii-274 pp., nombr. figg., cartes, plans, dépl., pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 1-902699-00-9. £120.
